testcase.name: testLogin
testcase.system-out: Navigating to Login Page... Navigating to login page: https://animated-gingersnap-8cf7f2.netlify.app/ Performing login... User is not logged in. Performing login... Waiting for username field... Username field found. Filling... Waiting for password field... Password field found. Filling... Clicking login button... Waiting for 3 seconds after login... Verifying login success... Login test passed: User successfully logged in and 'Web Application' is visible.
